# Inverse Gamma

> Inverse gamma distribution.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var invgamma = require( '@stdlib/math/base/dist/invgamma' );
```

#### invgamma

Inverse gamma distribution.

``` javascript
var dist = invgamma;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();

console.log( getKeys( invgamma ) );
